description:
Grown Up?
Mom is in a big rush as it`s close to the deadline. That is when Bunji popped in and started to play. Bunji kept on barging in and pestering Mom to play with him. Mom accidentally had a slip of the tongue...
Trendy Things 
Chinatsu pointed out Bunji`s t-shirt being tucked in and said it looked uncool. Bunji decides to tuck his shirt in. With Ma and his friends, they tried the trendy "low pants" look out...
Dreams, Short Lived
Love is something that appears out of nowhere... Fumi falls in love with her classmate who is good at soccer. At home, she acts like a young girl who gives off a pink aura and her Dad sheds tears...
Looks Like Dad
When Fumi was young, she got mad when people said that she looked like her Dad. It seems she doesn`t like the idea of comparing a middle-aged man to a young girl...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grown Up? / Trendy Things / Dreams, Short Lived / Look Like Dad
成長したか? / 流行りもの / 夢は, はかなく / パパ似
